trans-unit.source: Move data from Sybase | Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Move data from Sybase | Azure Data Factory

trans-unit.source: Learn about how to move data from Sybase Database using Azure Data Factory.
trans-unit.target: Learn about how to move data from Sybase Database using Azure Data Factory.

trans-unit.source: This article outlines how you can use the Copy Activity in an Azure data factory to move data from Sybase to another data store.
trans-unit.target: This article outlines how you can use the Copy Activity in an Azure data factory to move data from Sybase to another data store.

trans-unit.source: This article builds on the <linkText>data movement activities</linkText><title></title> article which presents a general overview of data movement with copy activity and supported data store combinations.
trans-unit.target: This article builds on the <linkText>data movement activities</linkText><title></title> article which presents a general overview of data movement with copy activity and supported data store combinations.

trans-unit.source: Data Factory service supports connecting to on-premises Sybase sources using the Data Management Gateway.
trans-unit.target: Data Factory service supports connecting to on-premises Sybase sources using the Data Management Gateway.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>moving data between on-premises locations and cloud</linkText><title></title> article to learn about Data Management Gateway and step-by-step instructions on setting up the gateway.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>moving data between on-premises locations and cloud</linkText><title></title> article to learn about Data Management Gateway and step-by-step instructions on setting up the gateway.

trans-unit.source: Note: You need to leverage the gateway to connect to Sybase even if it is hosted in Azure IaaS VMs.
trans-unit.target: Note: You need to leverage the gateway to connect to Sybase even if it is hosted in Azure IaaS VMs.

trans-unit.source: If you are trying to connect to an instance of Sybase hosted in cloud, you can also install the gateway instance in the IaaS VM.
trans-unit.target: If you are trying to connect to an instance of Sybase hosted in cloud, you can also install the gateway instance in the IaaS VM.

trans-unit.source: Data factory currently supports only moving data from Sybase to other data stores, not from other data stores to Sybase.
trans-unit.target: Data factory currently supports only moving data from Sybase to other data stores, not from other data stores to Sybase.

trans-unit.source: For Data Management Gateway to connect to the Sybase Database, you need to install the <linkText>data provider for Sybase</linkText><title></title> on the same system as the Data Management Gateway.
trans-unit.target: For Data Management Gateway to connect to the Sybase Database, you need to install the <linkText>data provider for Sybase</linkText><title></title> on the same system as the Data Management Gateway.

trans-unit.source: The sample below shows:
trans-unit.target: The sample below shows:

trans-unit.source: A linked service of type <linkText>OnPremisesSybase</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: A linked service of type <linkText>OnPremisesSybase</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: A liked service of type <linkText>AzureStorage</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: A liked service of type <linkText>AzureStorage</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: An input <linkText>dataset</linkText><title></title> of type <linkText>RelationalTable</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: An input <linkText>dataset</linkText><title></title> of type <linkText>RelationalTable</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: An output <linkText>dataset</linkText><title></title> of type <linkText>AzureBlob</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: An output <linkText>dataset</linkText><title></title> of type <linkText>AzureBlob</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>pipeline</linkText><title></title> with Copy Activity that uses <linkText>RelationalSource</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>BlobSink</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>pipeline</linkText><title></title> with Copy Activity that uses <linkText>RelationalSource</linkText><title></title> and <linkText>BlobSink</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: The sample copies data from a query result in Sybase database to a blob every hour.
trans-unit.target: The sample copies data from a query result in Sybase database to a blob every hour.

trans-unit.source: The JSON properties used in these samples are described in sections following the samples.
trans-unit.target: The JSON properties used in these samples are described in sections following the samples.

trans-unit.source: As a first step, please setup the data management gateway as per the instructions in the <linkText>moving data between on-premises locations and cloud</linkText><title></title> article.
trans-unit.target: As a first step, please setup the data management gateway as per the instructions in the <linkText>moving data between on-premises locations and cloud</linkText><title></title> article.

trans-unit.source: Sybase linked service:
trans-unit.target: Sybase linked service:

trans-unit.source: Azure Blob storage linked service:
trans-unit.target: Azure Blob storage linked service:

trans-unit.source: Sybase input dataset:
trans-unit.target: Sybase input dataset:

trans-unit.source: The sample assumes you have created a table “MyTable” in Sybase and it contains a column called “timestamp” for time series data.
trans-unit.target: The sample assumes you have created a table “MyTable” in Sybase and it contains a column called “timestamp” for time series data.

trans-unit.source: Setting “external”: true and specifying externalData policy tells data factory that this is a table that is external to the data factory and not produced by an activity in the data factory.
trans-unit.target: Setting “external”: true and specifying externalData policy tells data factory that this is a table that is external to the data factory and not produced by an activity in the data factory.

trans-unit.source: Note that the type of the linked service is set to: RelationalTable.
trans-unit.target: Note that the type of the linked service is set to: RelationalTable.

trans-unit.source: Azure Blob output dataset:
trans-unit.target: Azure Blob output dataset:

trans-unit.source: Data is written to a new blob every hour (frequency: hour, interval: 1).
trans-unit.target: Data is written to a new blob every hour (frequency: hour, interval: 1).

trans-unit.source: The folder path for the blob is dynamically evaluated based on the start time of the slice that is being processed.
trans-unit.target: The folder path for the blob is dynamically evaluated based on the start time of the slice that is being processed.

trans-unit.source: The folder path uses year, month, day, and hours parts of the start time.
trans-unit.target: The folder path uses year, month, day, and hours parts of the start time.

trans-unit.source: Pipeline with Copy activity:
trans-unit.target: Pipeline with Copy activity:

trans-unit.source: The pipeline contains a Copy Activity that is configured to use the above input and output datasets and is scheduled to run every hour.
trans-unit.target: The pipeline contains a Copy Activity that is configured to use the above input and output datasets and is scheduled to run every hour.

trans-unit.source: In the pipeline JSON definition, the source type is set to RelationalSource and sink type is set to BlobSink.
trans-unit.target: In the pipeline JSON definition, the source type is set to RelationalSource and sink type is set to BlobSink.

trans-unit.source: The SQL query specified for the query property selects the data from the DBA.Orders table in the database.
trans-unit.target: The SQL query specified for the query property selects the data from the DBA.Orders table in the database.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides description for JSON elements specific to Sybase linked service.
trans-unit.target: The following table provides description for JSON elements specific to Sybase linked service.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: Required

trans-unit.source: type
trans-unit.target: type

trans-unit.source: The type property must be set to: OnPremisesSybase
trans-unit.target: The type property must be set to: OnPremisesSybase

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: server
trans-unit.target: server

trans-unit.source: Name of the Sybase server.
trans-unit.target: Name of the Sybase server.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: database
trans-unit.target: database

trans-unit.source: Name of the Sybase database.
trans-unit.target: Name of the Sybase database.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: schema
trans-unit.target: schema

trans-unit.source: Name of the schema in the database.
trans-unit.target: Name of the schema in the database.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: authenticationType
trans-unit.target: authenticationType

trans-unit.source: Type of authentication used to connect to the Sybase database.
trans-unit.target: Type of authentication used to connect to the Sybase database.

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: Anonymous, Basic, and Windows.
trans-unit.target: Possible values are: Anonymous, Basic, and Windows.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: username
trans-unit.target: username

trans-unit.source: Specify user name if you are using Basic or Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: Specify user name if you are using Basic or Windows authentication.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: password
trans-unit.target: password

trans-unit.source: Specify password for the user account you specified for the username.
trans-unit.target: Specify password for the user account you specified for the username.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: gatewayName
trans-unit.target: gatewayName

trans-unit.source: Name of the gateway that the Data Factory service should use to connect to the on-premises Sybase database.
trans-unit.target: Name of the gateway that the Data Factory service should use to connect to the on-premises Sybase database.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Setting Credentials and Security</linkText><title></title> for details about setting credentials for an on-premises Sybase data source.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Setting Credentials and Security</linkText><title></title> for details about setting credentials for an on-premises Sybase data source.

trans-unit.source: For a full list of sections & properties available for defining datasets, see the <linkText>Creating datasets</linkText><title></title> article. Sections like structure, availability, and policy of a dataset JSON are similar for all dataset types (Azure SQL, Azure blob, Azure table, etc...).
trans-unit.target: For a full list of sections & properties available for defining datasets, see the <linkText>Creating datasets</linkText><title></title> article. Sections like structure, availability, and policy of a dataset JSON are similar for all dataset types (Azure SQL, Azure blob, Azure table, etc...).

trans-unit.source: The typeProperties section is different for each type of dataset and provides information about the location of the data in the data store.
trans-unit.target: The typeProperties section is different for each type of dataset and provides information about the location of the data in the data store.

trans-unit.source: The typeProperties section for dataset of type RelationalTable (which includes Sybase dataset) has the following properties.
trans-unit.target: The typeProperties section for dataset of type RelationalTable (which includes Sybase dataset) has the following properties.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: Required

trans-unit.source: tableName
trans-unit.target: tableName

trans-unit.source: Name of the table in the Sybase Database instance that linked service refers to.
trans-unit.target: Name of the table in the Sybase Database instance that linked service refers to.

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: Yes

trans-unit.source: For a full list of sections & properties available for defining activities, please see <linkText>Creating Pipelines</linkText><title></title> article. Properties like name, description, input and output tables, various policies etc. are available for all types of activities.
trans-unit.target: For a full list of sections & properties available for defining activities, please see <linkText>Creating Pipelines</linkText><title></title> article. Properties like name, description, input and output tables, various policies etc. are available for all types of activities.

trans-unit.source: Properties available in the typeProperties section of the activity on the other hand vary with each activity type and in case of Copy activity they vary depending on the types of sources and sinks.
trans-unit.target: Properties available in the typeProperties section of the activity on the other hand vary with each activity type and in case of Copy activity they vary depending on the types of sources and sinks.

trans-unit.source: In case of Copy Activity when source is of type RelationalSource (which includes Sybase) the following properties are available in typeProperties section:
trans-unit.target: In case of Copy Activity when source is of type RelationalSource (which includes Sybase) the following properties are available in typeProperties section:

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Allowed values
trans-unit.target: Allowed values

trans-unit.source: Required
trans-unit.target: Required

trans-unit.source: query
trans-unit.target: query

trans-unit.source: Use the custom query to read data.
trans-unit.target: Use the custom query to read data.

trans-unit.source: SQL query string.
trans-unit.target: SQL query string.

trans-unit.source: For example: select * from MyTable.
trans-unit.target: For example: select * from MyTable.

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: No

trans-unit.source: As mentioned in the data movement activities article Copy activity performs automatic type conversions from automatic type conversions from source types to sink types with the following 2 step approach:
trans-unit.target: As mentioned in the data movement activities article Copy activity performs automatic type conversions from automatic type conversions from source types to sink types with the following 2 step approach:

trans-unit.source: Convert from native source types to .NET type
trans-unit.target: Convert from native source types to .NET type

trans-unit.source: Convert from .NET type to native sink type
trans-unit.target: Convert from .NET type to native sink type

trans-unit.source: Sybase supports T-SQL and T-SQL types.
trans-unit.target: Sybase supports T-SQL and T-SQL types.

trans-unit.source: For a mapping table from sql types to .NET type, see <linkText>Azure SQL Connector</linkText><title></title> article.
trans-unit.target: For a mapping table from sql types to .NET type, see <linkText>Azure SQL Connector</linkText><title></title> article.
